column1: Master of Science in Computing Blockchain Technologies and Applications
column5: There is an increasing recognition of the importance of Blockchain and Distributed Ledger Technologies (DLTs) for companies in Ireland and internationally. The reason for this is that Blockchain/ DLTs are at the cutting edge of a vast range of new applications in quality control, contract management, digital currencies and transparency in governance.Blockchain is also a universal infrastructure that can store or transfer information anywhere, regardless of country.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
